TitleEnglish: Scooped Up by an S-Rank Adventurer!
SummaryEnglish: Lloyd, a white mage who has been banished from the hero's party. Afterwards, he happens to accompany an S-rank party on a quest. Lloyd believes he is a normal adventurer, but he is unmatched. One day, Lloyd, a white mage, is banished from the hero's party. Lloyd, who has lost his job, happens to accompany an S-rank party on a quest by chance. At that time, no one knew that the hero's party would collapse and Lloyd would gain fame... yet. This is the story of an extraordinary support magic user who thinks he is normal and becomes an adventurer, while he is unaware of how he eventually becomes peerless.
Aliases: Yūsha Party o Tsuihō Sareta Shiro Madōshi, S-Rank Bōkensha ni Hirowareru: Kono Shiro Madōshi ga Kikakugai Sugiru
Yuusha Party o Tsuihou Sareta Shiro Madoushi, S-Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru: Kono Shiro Madoushi ga Kikakugai Sugiru
Yuusha Party o Tsuihousareta Hakuma Doushi, S Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru ~Kono Hakuma Doushi ga Kikakugai Sugiru~
Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou sareta Shiromadoushi, S-Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru ~Kono Shiromadoushi ga Kikakugai Sugiru~
Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou sareta Shiro Madoushi, S-Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru: Kono Shiro Madoushi ga Kikakugai Sugiru
勇者パーティーを追放された白魔導師
White Magician Exiled From the Hero Party, Picked Up by S-Rank Adventurer
The White Mage Who was Banished From the Hero's Party is Picked Up by an S-Rank Adventurer: This White Mage is Too Out of the Ordinary!
Scooped Up By an S-Ranked Adventurer
Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou sareta Shiromadoushi, S-Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru: Kono Shiromadoushi ga Kikakugai Sugiru

1.SummaryEnglish: Lloyd grows up under the tutelage of Merlin, then becomes an adventurer under the Hero. Later, he's cast out.

2.SummaryEnglish: During his recruitment Lloyd learns the party's previous white mage has a sick sister, so he heals her.

3.SummaryEnglish: After learning about their quest, Lloyd travels with his new party and fights monsters alongside them.

4.SummaryEnglish: The party reaches their quest's farm and fights off thousands of manipulated monsters with Lloyd's support.

5.SummaryEnglish: Lloyd and the party race back to aid Ishtar, only to encounter a group of demons holding a beastwoman captive.

6.SummaryEnglish: Lina rallies Ishtar's defenders while Lloyd & Kureha free a 2nd horde of monsters and return to save Ishtar.

7.SummaryEnglish: Most monsters left, but golems are attacking Ishtar. Lloyd enhances the defenders and they save the city.

8.TitleEnglish: Lloyd Stays at a Hot Spring
8.SummaryEnglish: The party rests in a hot spring town. Silica masters a spell. Daggas gets a shield. Llyod improves his magic.

9.TitleEnglish: The S-Rank Adventurers Strive to Get Stronger
9.SummaryEnglish: Cross and Yui each meet someone new who helps them grow stronger while Lloyd improves his magic.

10.SummaryEnglish: Lloyd's party gets attacked by demons, and they fight one of the four great generals to protect Claire.

11.SummaryEnglish: Lloyd and his party race through the skies and challenge Grist to a rematch in order to rescue Claire.

12.TitleEnglish: Lloyd is Aware He Lacks Power
12.SummaryEnglish: The party escapes the crashing blimp and fights to unmerge the chimera. Yet using ancient magic is taboo.
